languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс пошатывается, словно от удара. Его немигающий взгляд вперивается в монстра перед вами.{/n} "Скаландр?"
{n}Heinrix staggers back as if from a blow. His unblinking gaze is fixed on the monster in front of you.{/n} "Scalander?"
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс пошатывается, словно от удара. Его немигающий взгляд вперивается в монстра перед вами.{/n} "Скаландр?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix staggers back as if from a blow. His unblinking gaze is fixed on the monster in front of you.{/n} "Scalander?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは殴られたかのように後ろへよろめく。その視線はあなたの目の前の怪物に釘付けになっている。{/n}「スカランダー？」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix staggers back as if from a blow. His unblinking gaze is fixed on the monster in front of you.{/n} "Scalander?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは殴られたかのように後ろへよろめく。その視線はあなたの目の前の怪物に釘付けになっている。{/n}「スカランダー？」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希踉跄着倒退了几步，仿佛挨了一拳一样。他目不转睛地盯着你面前的怪物。{/n}“斯卡兰德？”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix staggers back as if from a blow. His unblinking gaze is fixed on the monster in front of you.{/n} "Scalander?"

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希踉跄着倒退了几步，仿佛挨了一拳一样。他目不转睛地盯着你面前的怪物。{/n}“斯卡兰德？”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vacille comme s'il avait reçu un coup et fixe sans ciller le monstre devant vous.{/n} « Scalander ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix staggers back as if from a blow. His unblinking gaze is fixed on the monster in front of you.{/n} "Scalander?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vacille comme s'il avait reçu un coup et fixe sans ciller le monstre devant vous.{/n} « Scalander ? »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se tambalea hacia atrás como si recibiera un golpe. Su mirada impasible se clava en el monstruo que tiene delante.{/n} «¿Scalander?».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix staggers back as if from a blow. His unblinking gaze is fixed on the monster in front of you.{/n} "Scalander?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se tambalea hacia atrás como si recibiera un golpe. Su mirada impasible se clava en el monstruo que tiene delante.{/n} «¿Scalander?».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix wankt zurück, als hätte ihn ein Hieb getroffen. Sein starrer Blick ist auf das Monster vor dir gerichtet.{/n} "Scalander?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix staggers back as if from a blow. His unblinking gaze is fixed on the monster in front of you.{/n} "Scalander?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix wankt zurück, als hätte ihn ein Hieb getroffen. Sein starrer Blick ist auf das Monster vor dir gerichtet.{/n} "Scalander?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, âdeta darbeden kaçınırcasına geri çekiliyor. Soğukkanlı bakışları, önünde duran canavara kenetleniyor.{/n} "Scalander?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix staggers back as if from a blow. His unblinking gaze is fixed on the monster in front of you.{/n} "Scalander?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, bir darbeden kaçınırcasına geri çekiliyor. Soğukkanlı bakışları, önünde duran canavara kenetleniyor.{/n} "Scalander?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
